textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   Kraig All the VR/IS in the world wont stop a moving child only shutter speed can do that. I’d still say 17-55 on one body and the 85 1.4(wish I had one) on a second. The 28-70 would be my second choice. I have the 28-105 and yes its sharp and the macro is handy but it’s just not bright enough for a lot of indoor work. When I take it to a situation like the one you describe I wind up only using it for the 60-105 range and it’s not in the same league as the
